description: Lists the stack refactor actions that will be taken after calling the  ExecuteStackRefactor action.

parameters.name: StackRefactorId
parameters.description: The ID associated with the stack refactor created from the  CreateStackRefactor action.

nested_items.name: StackRefactorActions
nested_items.description: The stack refactor actions.

nested_items.name: Action
nested_items.description: The action that CloudFormation takes on the stack.

nested_items.name: Entity
nested_items.description: The type that will be evaluated in the StackRefactorAction. The following are potential Entity types:
Stack.
Resource.

nested_items.name: PhysicalResourceId
nested_items.description: The name or unique identifier associated with the physical instance of the resource.

nested_items.name: ResourceIdentifier
nested_items.description: A key-value pair that identifies the target resource. The key is an identifier property (for example, BucketName for AWS::S3::Bucket resources) and the value is the actual property value (for example, MyS3Bucket).

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description to help you identify the refactor.

nested_items.name: Detection
nested_items.description: The detection type is one of the following:
Auto: CloudFormation figured out the mapping on its own.
Manual: The customer provided the mapping in the ResourceMapping parameter.

nested_items.name: DetectionReason
nested_items.description: The description of the detection type.

nested_items.name: TagResources
nested_items.description: Assigns one or more tags to specified resources.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: Required. A string used to identify this tag. You can specify a maximum of 128 characters for a tag key. Tags owned by Amazon Web Services have the reserved prefix: aws:.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Required. A string containing the value for this tag. You can specify a maximum of 256 characters for a tag value.

nested_items.name: UntagResources
nested_items.description: Removes one or more tags to specified resources.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ResourceMapping
nested_items.description: The mapping for the stack resource Source and stack resource Destination.

nested_items.name: StackName
nested_items.description: The name associated with the stack.

nested_items.name: LogicalResourceId
nested_items.description: The logical name of the resource specified in the template.

nested_items.name: Destination
nested_items.description: The destination stack StackName and LogicalResourceId for the resource being refactored.

nested_items.name: StackName
nested_items.description: The name associated with the stack.

nested_items.name: LogicalResourceId
nested_items.description: The logical name of the resource specified in the template.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the request doesn't return all the remaining results, NextToken is set to a token. To retrieve the next set of results, call this action again and assign that token to the request object's NextToken parameter. If the request returns all results, NextToken is set to null.
